name: Tekkno Pidgeon
description:
A small "game" made while learning Unity (don't play it for your own good)

Song - "Tekkno Pidgeon" by Vargskelethor Joel (hopefully Joel won't find out about this crap I made)

Various free asset packs were used + some random free models I found on the Internet (I don't remember where I found them now).

P.S. I know it's actually a dove and not a pigeon but I couldn't find a decent free pigeon 3D model so I had to work with that.
